DOC.brief_title: Effect Uterotonic Carbetocin Acute Post Cesarean-Section Pain
DOC.criteria: Age 1845 , uneventful pregnancy , term ( > 37 0/7 week gestation ) , schedule elective CS include repeat CS lack informed consent , active labor , multiple pregnancy , polyhydramnios , severe fetal malformation
